title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Developing Social Problem-Solving Skills via Game-Based Mathematical Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can develop mathematics learning modules by applying the game-based learning design process (DDD-E model).
Learners can design at least three mathematics problem-solving scenarios utilizing game mechanics in mobile environments.
Learners can conduct project-based assessments for practitioners using designed game-based learning tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
